title: Fishing Regulator Rejects Lifting Ban on Female Crab Harvest
description: A commission acknowledged concerns about the threatened shorebirds that rely on crab eggs as a critical food source around the Delaware Bay.
dc:creator: Jon Hurdle

media:content.media:credit: Jessica Kourkounis for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A horseshoe crab on Reeds Beach in the Delaware Bay.
